tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE gene_expression (
  gene_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name STRING,
  tissue_type STRING,
  expression_level DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE gene_expression_levels (gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
              gene_name VARCHAR(255),
              tissue_type VARCHAR(100),
              expression_level FLOAT);

CREATE TABLE tissue_information (tissue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
              tissue_name VARCHAR(100),
              body_location VARCHAR(100),
              sample_size INT);

CREATE TABLE GeneExpressionLevels (
    gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tissue_name VARCHAR(50),
    expression_level DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE TissueInformation (
    tissue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tissue_name VARCHAR(50),
    tissue_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE GeneAnnotations (
    annotation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_id INT,
    annotation_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ExperimentResults (
    experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_id INT,
    tissue_id INT,
    result_value DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE gene_information (
    gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_name VARCHAR(50),
    chromosome VARCHAR(10),
    start_position INT,
    end_position INT
);

CREATE TABLE sample_information (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tissue_id INT,
    gene_id INT,
    expression_level FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (tissue_id) REFERENCES tissue_information(tissue_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES gene_information(gene_id)
);

CREATE TABLE experiment_information (
    experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    description TEXT
);
